import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; const CharacterDetail = props => { return (

Character: {props.name}

  • Specie: {props.specie}
  • Origin: {props.origin}
  • Episodes: {props.episode.length}
  • Status : {props.status}
) } export default CharacterDetail;
